forgot-password.body: Provide your email and we will send you a link that will allow you to create a new password.
forgot-password.question: Forgot Password?
forgot-password.heading: <0>Forgot your Password?<1></1>Not a problem.</0>

verify-account: Hey! Can you <1>verify your email address</1> (<2></2>) for us? <3>Re-send confirmation email</3>

notification.error: There was an error. Please try again.
notification.retry-reset-password: Error! Please open link from the forgot password email again.
